Kuvaytda odamfurushlarning ayollarni Instagram orqali sotgani aniqlandi (video)

03 Nov 2019, 15:59

Kuvaytda odam savdosi bilan shug‘ullanuvchilar Google va Apple ilovalariga, Instagram’ga cho‘rilik bilan shug‘ullanadigan ayollar sotilishi haqidagi e’lonlar joylashtirgani aniqlandi. Hukumat esa ushbu e’lonlarni o‘chirib tashlashni buyurdi. Bu boradagi ma’lumotlar BBC surishtiruvida aniqlandi deb xabar berdi “Interfaks”.
Qulfurushlar Instagram’da e’lonlari tez ommalashishi uchun maids for sale (“xizmatkorlar chegirma bilan sotiladi” mazmunida) xeshtegidan foydalangan.


Foto: BBC

BBC surishtiruvi e’lon qilingach Kuvayt hukumati qulfurushlardan akkauntlarni o‘chirib tashlashni talab qildi va ular odam savdosi bilan boshqa shug‘ullanmaslik haqida qonuniy tilxat yozdi.

Mavzuga doir: 
Qizlarni fohishalik uchun Turkiyaga yubormoqchi bo‘lgan jinoiy guruh a’zolari ushlandi

O‘z navbatida ijtimoiy tarmoq vakillari qullar savdosiga taaluqli barcha e’lonlarning Instagram’dan ham Facebook’dan o‘chirib tashlanganini ma’lum qilgan. Kompaniya kelajakda ham bu kabi salbiy holatlarga qarshi kurashishga va’da berdi.

Mavzuga doir: 
AQShda 16 nafar dengizchi odam savdosi va giyohvand moddalar kontrabandasida ayblanib qo‘lga olindi

Kuvayt mehnat resurslari boshqarmasi boshlig‘i Muborak al-Azimiy BBC materialida fosh etilgan 16 yoshli gvineyalik qizni pullagan politsiyachi va qulfurush ayol ishi yuzasidan tergov boshlanganligini ma’lum qildi. Uning so‘zlariga ko‘ra tergovdan keyin aybdorlar hibsga olinishi yoki odam savdosi qurboni bo‘lgan qizga yetkazilgan ma’naviy zarar uchun kompensatsiya to‘lab berishi mumkin.
text:
Kuwait traffickers sell women via Instagram (video)

03 Nov 2019, 15:59

In Kuwait, it has been revealed that traffickers have posted ads on Google and Apple apps, Instagram, and for women selling handcuffs. The government ordered them to delete these ads. According to the BBC, the information was confirmed by Interfax.
The locksmith used the maids for sale hashtag to get their ad on Instagram quickly.


Photo: BBC

Following the announcement of the BBC's inquiry, the Kuwaiti government demanded that the traffickers delete their accounts and have written a legal restraint on trafficking.

Topic:
Members of the criminal group who wanted to send girls to Turkey for prostitution were detained

In turn, social network representatives reported that all ads related to the slave trade were also deleted from Facebook on Instagram. The company has pledged to continue to deal with such incidents in the future.

Topic:
16 sailors in the United States have been arrested on charges of human trafficking and drug smuggling

The head of the Kuwaiti Department of Labor Mubarak al-Azimi said that an investigation into the case of a policeman and a female slave who had kidnapped a 16-year-old girl from Guinea was revealed in the BBC. According to him, after the investigation, the perpetrators may be arrested or compensated for the moral damage to the victim.
